summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of ÖH Wirtschaft website design updates. All layout changes implemented correctly - images positioned next to text (not as background), logo size increased, and text updated from 'JKU Linz' to 'ÖH JKU Linz'.

design_issues.issue: On mobile devices, hero section images are still visible despite having 'hidden lg:block' class - should be hidden on mobile for better user experience

passed_tests: Hero section displays 3-image collage positioned right of text
About section shows 2 images positioned left of text
Gallery section displays exactly 5 images in grid layout
Navbar logo shows correct text 'ÖH JKU Linz' and is appropriately sized (48x48px)
Footer logo displays 'ÖH JKU Linz' correctly
All navigation links (Studium, LVA, Magazine) function properly
Mobile responsive navigation menu opens and closes correctly
All Google Drive images successfully integrated into layout
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor improvement: Consider hiding hero section images on mobile devices for better mobile UX (currently visible despite lg:block class)
